title: Edgar Kaplan Remembered, II by Jeff Rubens
excerpt: The second part of a tribute to Edgar Kaplan and his contributions to bridge.

Many & Max HARDY's: "Four diamonds. In our methods, we would bid four clubs to transfer."

That's nice. Give your LHO, who may hold five-five in the majors, an easy four-diamond bid. Count us out of that convention.

Bobby WOLFF: "Four diamonds. When vulnerable opponents open a strong two-bid, higher preemptive tactics may be called for."
